item.title: Salesforce’s Long-Awaited Inflection is Here: Rally On!
item.description: Salesforce is well-positioned to accelerate growth and outperform its improved guidance, driven by agentic AI. Analysts are lifting price targets.

item.title: Rocket Lab USA Receives Wall Street Validation: Time to Buy?
item.description: Baird and Morgan Stanley issued bullish upgrades as Rocket Lab extended its flawless Electron launch streak and secured new JAXA contracts.

item.title: Archer Buys Rival's Patent Treasure Trove in Strategic Move
item.description: Archer Aviation's strategic acquisition of Lilium's patent portfolio strengthens its technology base and has sparked a positive stock market rally.

item.title: What Amazon's Chart Says a Week Before Earnings
item.description: Amazon shares are coiled just below $240 ahead of next week's earnings. The chart says a breakout potential is on the cards, now it’s all about timing...
